content.text: I'm a huge fan of Toyota, what's your favorite brand of car?
I've always wanted a Toyota! I'm from California, but I'm not sure if they're sold here.
I'm sure you can find one somewhere! They're pretty popular. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Mittens. She's pretty cool. I'm going to school to be a veterinarian's assistant.
That's awesome! I used to work with animals, it was really rewarding. Do you play any instruments?
I used to play the piano, but I haven't practiced in a while. I love music though.
Me too! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into rock right now.
I love rock too! What are your favorite bands?
I like The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin. What about you?
I like those bands too! I also like The Who, Pink Floyd, and Jimi Hendrix.
Those are all great bands! I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
